data.title: Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University – Free
meta_keywords: Study in Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University
Apply to Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University
data.meta_description: Name of University is Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University. Choose Study Program, Compare Tuition And Fees and Apply Online to Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University. Chats online with university admissions officers on official pages of universities.
data.text:
About the university

~ €454 / year

Many years of training experience High scientific degree Located in a promising city

Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University - Metropolitan University, owned by the territorial community of Kyiv. University history begins in 1874. Grinchenko University - multidisciplinary institution, which is in the top ten best universities of Kiev! The university has over 8,500 students. Perennial University educational traditions combined with modern innovative approaches in training. Training focused on European standards.

How to apply to the university

Choose a program

Press “Apply now” button

Send an application form

Complete admissions tasks

Go to study

To apply to Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University follow these steps. To get more information about the university and the admissions process, you can use the live chat to contact a university representative.

Required documents for admission

When applying for admission to Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University in Ukraine you should prepare all required documents. Request a list of necessary documents directly from a university, as it may vary for different countries. Using our live chat, you can also ask for sample documents.

Health and Life Insurance

Letter of Acceptance

Photographs

Student visa

HIV-test Certificate

Declaration for financial support

Motivation Letter

Medical Certificate

Proof of fee payment

Birth Certificate

Passport

Family Details

Application fee

Why people choose this university

Many years of training experience High scientific degree Located in a promising city

Free Apply is not responsible for the content of this page. Through the Site, Free Apply provides an online catalog which you can use to find different types of educational institutions. It’s possible for a new university to be registered by any user, however only verified university representatives will be able to manage, reply in chat and make changes to a university page. Once the University registers its official representative, it has the right to block access for others to edit the information. Further control over the content will be carried out by the representative of the University. Registration with the Free-Apply.com catalog is free.
